text:
Champions League
OL: the reaction of Houssem Aouar
Author of a high-level match tonight, Houssem Aouar was one of the great guys in the Olympique Lyonnais victory against Benfica. Discover his reaction.
05 Nov 2019, 22:17 by Antoine Chirat



In difficulty at the beginning of the season, Houssem Aouar seems to be gradually regaining his best level. For proof, it was one of the best Lyonnais during the nice victory of the Gones against Benfica. "In the attitude and in the collective spirit, it was a lot better tonight, it's a third win in a row, we're very satisfied, we've been a lot less serene in the second half, that's where it will have to work, everything is not yet acquired.We are very satisfied to have nothing to let go, especially after taking a goal "explained the young midfielder after the meeting.
